page.title: 04WIS. GREEN BROWNIES/GUIDES
page.content: The Brownies have a Brown Owl as their leader and they meet on Thursdays after school.The Brownies wear a brown and yellow uniform with one of two sorts of hat.These are a brown woollen hat or a beret.The Wisborough Green brownies like to play "ships", "zoos", "chase" and "witches".The brownies have a plastic toadstool and brown owl for them to sit around in a ring. The Wisborough Green guides uniform is a navy blue skirt, a lighter blue shirt, a navy blue hat, a red scarf and white socks.The different companies of guides have different coloured scarves e.g. The Petworth guides have scarves that are red, white and blue.During the Easter holidays the local companies have a joint camping competition.
